title: NCC Introduction
text: Platform trials multi-arm multi-stage clinical trials aim evaluating efficacy several treatment arms within single trial. Experimental treatments permitted enter exit trial different times, new treatments become available, total number newly added treatments pre-specified. Moreover, treatment arms may compared shared control group. treatments enter trial later, control group divided concurrent (CC) non-concurrent controls (NCC), .e., patients randomized given treatment arm entered trial.  using NCC data can offer several benefits, reduced sample size increased statistical power, may also introduce bias effect estimators time trends present trial.
